content: BOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKINGBOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKINGBOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKING WEBSITE  TWITTER  TWITTER FACEBOOK  FACEBOOK TELEGRAM  TELEGRAM What is AXIOMA ?Axioma is a second chance for those who are risking to lose their home and a way to provide investors with an ethical income opportunity with no speculation.REAL ESTATE INNOVATION IN ITALIA Thanks to the cryptocurrency breakthrough, Axioma allows owners of properties put on auction or confiscated to regain possession of their own home thanks to the support of an investment network anchorFOR INVESTORSAxioma will cash in the rent and distribute shares to investors, allowing them to profit with no speculation.A NEW OPPORTUNITYWe buy the property and we let it to the garnishee, who can pay a rent and continue to live in their own house.relates to your style and story.[/color]Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Wednesday/Thursday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsAxioma investments is starting its Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with BGT tokens. ¬†The Bounty campaign will start from October 21,2022 till 6 week. Payment will be by the TeamWeek 1 (21 Oct - 27 Oct)..........EndWeek 2 (28 Oct - 03 Nov)..........EndWeek 3 (04 Nov- 10 Nov)..........EndWeek 4 (11 Nov- 17 Nov)..........StoppedWeek 5 (18 Nov- 24 Nov)..........Week 6 (25 Nov- 01 Dec).......... Join here (telegram) &  HERE to get updatesBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaignüåç Section D: Article Campaignüåç Section E: Tiktok Campaignüåç Section F: Youtube CampaignMandatory Rules‚ñ†If you Submit your work report without applying, your stakes will not count;‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group; & Telegram group‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group; &  Bounty ANN;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter; & Twitter‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Thursday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Telegram username: Which campaign you joined: BSC wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Tiktok Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE YoutubeCampaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter ; & Twitter ‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with "#axioma #axiomainvestments #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT $BGT ;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 3 months;‚ñ†TwitterAudit score of at least 70% will be accepted.#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original, About https://axiomainvestments.com/;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter, Facebook, and Telegram link into your content;‚ñ†Must add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in your content;Content Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesRules of Tiktok Campaign:‚ñ†Make Tiktok Video about https://axiomainvestments.com/ ‚ñ†Minimum 100 Followers/Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Video minimum length 20 Seconds;‚ñ†Your title must include the word Axioma Investments. And Use hashtag #axioma #axiomainvestments #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT $BGT;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username in Video CommentTiktok Video Rewards Depend on Quality and how unique this is.Rules of Youtube Campaign:‚ñ†Make Youtube Video about https://axiomainvestments.com/ ‚ñ†Minimum 1000 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word The Bit Gold. And Use hashtag #axioma #axiomainvestments #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT $BGT;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, Instagram Link, and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 1000-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Campaign Spreadsheet/Master Spreadsheet (Participants List)[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done after end of bounty. I am bounty manager for this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]BOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKINGBOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKINGBOUNTY PAUSED. STOP WORKING
